backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profile management and expense CRUD operations with access control, including functions for creating, updating, deleting, and querying expenses with authentication checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features for expandable details sections (monthly, yearly, multi-yearly, and independent expansion) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the expense tracking application with authentication and React Query integration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm ledger-inspired neutral tones and brown/tan accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with favicon reference, meta tags, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component wrapping the app with ThemeProvider, rendering AppLayout with DailyExpensesPage, and including Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Empty authentication gate component file (currently unused or pass-through).
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Empty login button component file (implementation details not provided in content).
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty profile setup modal component file (implementation details not provided in content).
frontend/src/components/expenses/Expanda: Reusable component with toggle button that expands/collapses to show ExpenseDetailsTable, fetching expenses via date range or accepting provided expenses array with loading states.
frontend/src/components/expenses/Expense: Table component displaying sorted expenses (most recent first) with columns for date, category, submitter, and amount, showing empty state when no expenses exist.
Expense list item component with inline editing for name, type, and amount fields, plus save/cancel/delete actions with validation and loading states using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component with sticky header showing app logo/title, main content area, and footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/features/expenses/date.ts: Utility functions for converting between JavaScript Date objects and backend Time format (nanoseconds as bigint), including start-of-day conversion and same-day comparison.
frontend/src/features/expenses/queryKeys: Centralized React Query key factory for expense-related queries to ensure consistent caching and invalidation across the application.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useAllExp: React Query hook that fetches all expenses from the backend using the anonymous actor.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useAllYea: React Query hook that fetches the total of all expenses across all years up to now from the backend.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useCreate: React Query mutation hook for creating expenses that invalidates daily, monthly, yearly, and all-years total queries on success.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useDailyT: React Query hook that fetches the total expenses for a specific day using the provided dayTime timestamp.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useDelete: React Query mutation hook for deleting expenses that invalidates daily, monthly, yearly, and all-years total queries on success.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useExpens: React Query hook that fetches all expenses and filters them client-side to return only expenses matching the specified day.
React Query hook that fetches expenses within a specified date range from the backend.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useMonthl: React Query hook that fetches the total expenses for the current month up to now from the backend.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useUpdate: React Query mutation hook for updating expenses that invalidates daily, monthly, yearly, and all-years total queries on success.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useYearly: React Query hook that fetches the total expenses for the current year up to now from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an anonymous (unauthenticated) backend actor for public API access.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity state, and login status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including background, foreground, card, chart, and sidebar color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DailyExpensesPage.tsx: Main page component for daily expense tracking with date selection, expense form input, and displays daily/monthly/yearly/all-time totals with expandable detail sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and animation keyframes for the UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the expense tracker app's architecture, existing features for expandable detail sections per time period, and pending backend query method implementation.
